parblock.para: Tutorials suite covering the pressio C++ library.

sect1.title: Build and Run

parblock.para: All you need CMake > 3.18.0 and a C++14 compliant compiler.

sect1.para: gitclone--recursivegit@github.com:Pressio/pressio-tutorials.git exportCXX=<path-to-your-CXX-compiler> cdpressio-tutorials&&mkdirbuild&&cdbuild cmake-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release.. make-j4 Individual executables for all tutorials are built inside the build subdirectory.

sect1.title: Disclaimer
sect1.para: This is still work-in-progress, some coverage might be missing. We are actively working on adding more. If you don't find something, you can temporarily look at C++ tests subdirectory, which contains tests for everything. These tests are readable, but are obviously not formatted in a tutorial fashion.
